**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 152 2.0 **Price** 160 gp **Usage** worn headwear **Bulk** L --- Repurposing and enchanting a helmet worn by a battlefield commander can create a _tactician’s hel_m, imparting knowledge of battlefield tactics that feeds off your minor victories. The helm grants you a +1 item bonus to [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) checks. Also, a jewel adorns the brow of the helmet. This jewel becomes charged each time you hit a creature with a [Reactive Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2256). A tactician’s helm can hold up to 2 charges, and its charges reset to 0 when you invest it. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))**Cost** 1 charge from the helm; **Frequency** once per hour; **Effect** You choose one of the following effects.
  • **Charge!** Stride twice.
  • **Move It!** You gain a +2 status bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the end of this turn.
  • **Protect!** If you're wielding a shield, Stride to a space adjacent to an ally, then Raise your Shield.
  • **Re-Arm!** Interact up to three times. Each of these actions must be used to do something on [Table 6–2: Changing Equipment](/Rules.aspx?ID=194).
name: Tactician's Helm
